description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

As you invoke runes from disparate traditions of magic, their diametrically opposed effects repel each other in a destructive backlash. You invoke two runes of your choice on a single creature, which must be from opposed traditions of magic; either 1 arcane and 1 divine rune, or 1 occult and 1 primal rune. in addition to the runes' normal effects, the target must also attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:runesmith] saving throw as destructive magical harmonics clash in their body.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, but if they take an action to steady themself, the sickened condition ends immediately.

Failure The target is sickened 1.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.
